plot: Meg, a young ballet student, idolizes the school's top ballerina, the shallow Ariane Bouchet. Meg is distressed when she learns visiting prima ballerina Darina rather than Bouchet will play the lead in the school's production of &"Swan Lake.&" So on opening night, Meg arranges an accident which nearly kills Darina and ends her dancing career. As a result, Bouchet becomes a star, while Meg is torn with guilt.   Written by  Daniel Bubbeo
title: The Unfinished Dance
plot_es: Meg, a young ballet student, idolizes the school's top ballerina, the shallow Ariane Bouchet.
